CustomField.description: Determines what discount tier the customer is placed in for discount guidance. Each account has a consumable tier based on consumable spend over a specific 12 month period at the NGN level and instrument credit tier based on the installed base.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Determines what discount tier the customer is placed in for discount guidance. Each account has a consumable tier based on consumable spend over a specific 12 month period at the NGN level and instrument credit tier based on the installed base.
CustomField.label: Customer Historic Spend
